thread.title: 16 Times Kourtney Kardashian Basically Went Out in Her Underwear
thread.title_full: 16 Times Kourtney Kardashian Basically Went Out in Her Underwear

title: 16 Times Kourtney Kardashian Basically Went Out in Her Underwear
text:
16 Times Kourtney Kardashian Basically Went Out in Her Underwear Nicole Fabian-Weber 
Xavier Collin/IPA/Splash News 
Leave it to Kourtney Kardashian to (constantly) step out what appears to be undergarments and kill it. Kourtney of course would look good covered in seaweed, but somehow she manages to make all the undies, bras, and lingerie-type pieces she wears look like, you know, clothes. 
From silky little nighties to full-on lace bras, here are 16 times Kourtney Kardashian, oddly enough, inspired us to step out in our underwear. 
We would look just like her ... right?
